item.description:
Hi A-Team,

Tomorrow we will still be having rehearsal from 4-6pm,

Democracy Center has been hard to schedule and with the weather looking less than glamorous, we are going to meetup at 50 Vassar St., Cambridge.

It's a MIT building with open classrooms that have plenty of room for reherasal. We will meet in the lobby. The building has revolving doors and you really can't miss it.

Just googlemaps it and you can't miss it.

Any questions or concerns please call me or email me.

We really need to rehearse as a whole group and build our chemistry and further our skills. As the A-Team you guys have to bring your A-game to rehearsal so we can bring our A-game to our audiences.

Everyone needs to be on the same page in terms of growth. We need to practice practice practice in order to maintain our group energy and to have stronger performances.

This week we will work on how to start a scene and maintaining character and energy. We will also focus on overall scene structure in terms of finding the game, the conflict, heightening, and finding a ending to a scene.

Thanks,

Jason J.

group.name: Great Boston Chapter of Laughing Matter - Auditions Circle

item.name: Ensemble A Rehearsal
